content.body: yulia: I pushed up a handful of minor editorial tweaks to the TLA PR (see https://github.com/tc39/ecma262/pull/2408/commits; my first one was "adopt 545-style structured headers for new AOs", which you can ignore) - can you take a look over those when you get a chance? I think editors are all happy with it now, otherwise
